item.description:
Hey Folks,

I thought I'd schedule a different type of happy hour. The Boston Harbor Hotel will have live blues bands every Thursday evening this summer from 6pm to 10pm outside behind the hotel.

The "Blues Barge" is located outside behind the hotel. The band sets up on the barge and people hang out on the steps to listen.

I will wear a GREEN shirt and I'm asking everyone to also wear something GREEN. That way, all you have to do is look for a group of people wearing GREEN.

I don't know if we can get drinks. If we can't get a drink while listening to the band, then just maybe, we could go inside the hotel at 10pm for a very late happy hour in the lounge.

Click on this to get more info:

http://www.bhh.com/su...

The name of the band for this particular Thursday evening is Rick Russell & The Cadillac Horns. I've never seen them, so please no hate mail if they suck.

Hope to see you all there!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear something GREEN.
item.name: Rick Russell & The Cadillac Horns - Wear GREEN!
